describe.name: Depoorter Franck
describe.address: 29 rue de la Pannerie, 59840 Pérenchies, France

aboutme.about1: Curious, persevering and autonomous, former social mediator, I had the chance to practice different aspects of mediation. This allowed me to acquire different skills over the years but above all human values. After 15 years, I decided to reconvert myself as a web developer.
aboutme.dev: After several diplomas in the social field, when I chose to retrain, I chose the Wild Code School in Lille, labeled Grande Ecole du Numérique, which uses reverse pedagogy and allows me to work on different projects (including a real client) at the within different teams in agile methodology (SCRUM). It is an intensive 5 and 3 month training where we focus on mutual aid, research and the development of each person's autonomy.
